title: Why lag in summonersrift only
body: When i join summoners rift i always get 2000 ping, but when i join aram i get 24. Please help me, and sry bad english.

replies.body:
There could be issues along your network routing that are directly affecting your latency when accessing specific gameservers. Before we take a deep look into your network routing, I'd like you to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League by working through our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this caused any changes.
